column5: Million Dollar View of Clear Lake boating community that opens into the Gulf of Mexico. Gorgeous sunsets, Boathouse with power for your yacht or sling for you high performance boat. Watch sailboats and yachts go by from your lagoon pool/spa/waterfall. Two full kitchens. 6035 SF Furnished living space. driveway with private gate entry..
column8: Mansion on Water off Galveston Bay
